title: Dawn Will Rise
lyrics:
Tu dois changer avec le temps
Je dois changer ou mourir
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh

The truth comes quickly, I found out

The future swiftly time runs down

A liar's leaving me without a doubt

Come and hit me, strike me while I'm down



Fortune's fate in time

I must change or die

Change or die

Oh, oh, oh, oh

Change or die

Oh, oh, oh, oh



Silent secrets, quiet hands

I know their story, an old romance

Come and kill me while you can

I will take you, this is our last dance



Fortune's fate in time

I must change or die

Dawn will rise

Dawn will rise

Dawn will rise

Oh, oh



Oh, oh, oh, oh

Oh, oh, oh, oh



Fortune's fate in time

I must change or die

Fortune's fate in time

I must change or die

Dawn will rise
